author: gus gonzalez
comment: Funny... If you're looking for exact time go elsewhere, the description sets up the appropriate expectation. I love the watch face and it's comic feel

author: Anastasia Kutchar
comment: I have synced, uninstalled, installed, resynced. It will not show up on my moto360. I cant refund in so basically a waste of money
title: No use

author: Dave Vago
comment: Would rather have app settings on phone.
title: Very nice.

author: Vaughn Pani
comment: Love it.  Lots of options for customization. Works great!
title: Lots of features

author: Byron Jenkins
comment: Love it,wow really cool.
title: Cool

author: Team USA
comment: It was different. :)
title: Pretty cool

author: Joey Burton
comment: Sweet

author: Richard Schilling
comment: It's great to see some genuine creativity in wafch faces. Additional art choices for bravo guys would get you five stars.
title: Nice!

author: James VanDieren
comment: Beautiful watch face, but I sometimes need the precise time and find myself having to switch away from it.
title: Beautiful watch face, but...

author: Adrian Robinson
comment: Watch faces look great.

author: Mark Timms
comment: Rebooted, resynced, refunded. Well,  refund attempted, but uninstall failed. Face doesn't appear to exist anywhere, either on my moto 360, or on my phone. All on the requisite software or later. Shame, it looks like it should be a great watchface.

reply.author: Webfrucht Development
reply.content: This is a watch face only. You find the watch face where it belongs, in the list of watchfaces inside the wear application and on the watch itself.

title: Doesn't seem to exist...

author: Tom Hughes
comment: I really like this watch face - it's a great concept. Just one request - can you please add an option to turn the battery indicator off? It detracts from the overall effect.

reply.author: Webfrucht Development
reply.content: Ok. It's on the request-list now.

title: Great

author: Eddie Brown
comment: Now I like it a lot.  However the settings on the phone are a bit cumbersome to get to.

reply.author: Webfrucht Development
reply.content: The android is the default-skin. You can edit the watchface directly on the watch, in the watchface selection.

title: Good

author: Dylan Miller
comment: Moto 360 on 5.0.1, synced android wear and restarted, still not showing up to apply as face. Shame, I'm super pumped to use this. Won't refund, I'll wait for an update
title: Moto 360

author: Mike Hearn
comment: Very nice effect. I'm very much looking forward to the other items on the request list though: being able to cycle the faces and disable the battery indicator. Then it'd be perfect.
title: Works great!

author: Pietro De Napoli
comment: Hard to find the app, only after a while I realised it was in the android wear app itself

author: Frank Speer
comment: Is it possible to make the watch faces change (cycle through all faces) like every hour or day?

reply.author: Webfrucht Development
reply.content: It is. It's on the request-list now.

title: Very Cool!

author: Jordan Whited
comment: There is no option to change the watch face in the android wear app. One star until this is fixed

reply.author: Webfrucht Development
reply.content: You can do it on the watch. No handheld needed!

title: Can't change the watch face...

author: Michael Cuneo
comment: How do you change/access the settings?

reply.author: Webfrucht Development
reply.content: Directly on the watch, when selecting the Face there is a config-button below the Icon.

author: BullCity Thug
comment: Awesome stands out,  would love more choices though.
title: Love it

author: Steve M
comment: I like it a lot

author: Shahnawaz Datardina
comment: Who wants to know the exact time anyway

author: Alexandra Allen
comment: So cool faces!

author: Marc Cohen
comment: My favourite watch face.

author: Keon Parsa
comment: Maybe make it so the cards don't cover everything
title: Great look

author: Ah-Lun Tang
comment: Great support from this developer after I reported a small issue! Also a very nice watchface.
